title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.10 - Requisition of lodging
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.10 - Requisition of lodging

State Regulations

When for any reason rental is impracticable, emergency
lodging shall be requisitioned for a temporary period under subdivision 3 of
section 25 of the Defense Emergency Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
